thinker.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who thinks carefully about important subjects such as science or philosophy, especially someone who is famous for thinking of new ideas
thinker.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: great thinkers such as Kant and Schopenhauer
thinker.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a sculpture by Auguste Rodin of a man sitting and thinking with his elbow on his knee and his chin on his hand
